quest.text:
Right now, x is false. Because of this the if statement will evaluate to false, and the code within this if will be skipped. We want the program to print "x was true!"
Modify the value of x to get this output!
Remember: boolean values can be true, or false!
Congratulations! You helped Richard with his problem! if statements are extremely useful in programming! Next we will look at the else if, and else statements!
